meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jordan Boyd-Graber Ying Evelyn Rubin Nancy Schoppa Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7828.

td.p: Jordan Boyd-Graber Ying, an associate professor of computer science from Riverdale Park, Maryland
Evelyn Rubin, a family physician from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Nancy Schoppa, a retired high school teacher from Saint Jo, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $35,000)

tr.td: THE GREAT BRITISH COIN HUNT
NAME THE NOVEL
ANAGRAMS
COLLEGE COURSES
VIDEO GAMES
IN OTTER NEWS
